bibl.title: with contributions by Sarah CLACKSON, Barry KEMP, Gillian PYKE and Richard REECE, Late Roman Pottery at Amarna and Related Studies. (Egypt Exploration Society. Excavation Memoirs. 72.)
bibl.note: 1 carte en front., tabl., profils, figg., cartes, plans.
Fouilles de l'E.E.S. à Kôm el-Nana (monastère au sud d'Amarna), 1988. - 7 contributions. - Pp. 3-5: Introduction; - 275-282: References. - Un second vol. est en préparation.
FAIERS Jane, with contributions by Sarah CLACKSON, Barry KEMP, Gillian PYKE and Richard REECE, Late Roman Pottery at Amarna and Related Studies. (Egypt Exploration Society. Excavation Memoirs. 72.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2005, 4°, vi-282 pp., 1 carte en front., tabl., profils, figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 0-85698-162-1. £60.
